step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Open hood.
Drain automatic transmission fluid into suitable container.
Remove drive shaft from transmission, include support second section.
Disconnect transmission shift cable from transmission.
Disconnect transmission wiring harness necessary to remove transmission.
Disconnect oil filler pipe from transmission, secure out of way.
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe from turbocharger, secure out of way for access to remove transmission.
Remove torque converter nuts.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine except two.
Disconnect oil cooler lines from transmission.
Install transmission jack and secure to transmission.
Remove automatic transmission assembly, include remove remaining bolts.
Install automatic transmission assembly, include install bolts retaining transmission to engine.
Remove jack from transmission.
Connect oil cooler lines to transmission.
Install torque converter nuts.
Connect exhaust outlet pipe to turbocharger.
Connect oil filler pipe to transmission.
Connect transmission wiring harness, include secure harness with plastic ties.
Connect transmission shift cable to transmission.
Install drive shaft to transmission, include connect second. Torque to spec.
Fill automatic transmission fluid.
Start complete engine assembly, top off fluid as needed.
Close hood assembly.
Remove wheel chocks
